item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 17, 2024 at 4:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Indiana police are seizing FedEx packages containing cash (118 points | 54 comments)
2. Chain of Thought Empowers Transformers to Solve Inherently Serial Problems (72 points | 36 comments)
3. Nyxpsi – A Next-Gen Network Protocol for Extreme Packet Loss (108 points | 45 comments)
4. FreeBSD 13.4-Release Announcement (62 points | 7 comments)
5. A lonely man in his 30s found community in an unlikely place: spin class (11 points | 3 comments)
6. Why to Not Write a Book (8 points | 4 comments)
7. Launch HN: Silurian (YC S24) – Simulate the Earth (265 points | 129 comments)
8. K340A: The Brain Computer of Chernobyl Duga Radar [video] (108 points | 22 comments)
9. Titan Submersible Marine Board of Investigation (22 points | 6 comments)
10. Franzelio: Draw Lines. Make Music. Share Your Instrument (41 points | 13 comments)
11. Amazon tells employees to return to office five days a week (925 points | 1059 comments)
12. What are the best options for Amazon SDEs thinking about leaving over RTO policy (18 points | 1 comment)
13. A Spreadsheet and a Debugger Walk into a Shell (145 points | 7 comments)
14. Y Combinator is predicated on startups that require low capitalization (99 points | 55 comments)
15. Intel foundry business to make custom chip for Amazon, chipmaker's shares jump (88 points | 39 comments)
16. Mecanum Wheel (32 points | 7 comments)
17. Michigan Micro Mote (M3) makes history as the smallest computer (2015) (12 points | 2 comments)
18. Dissecting the gzip format (2011) (25 points | 4 comments)
19. Bionicle – my actual part in its origins (2015) (5 points | discuss)
20. We fine-tuned an LLM to triage and fix insecure code (13 points | 4 comments)
21. Datomic and Content Addressable Techniques (127 points | 30 comments)
22. Intel lost the Sony Playstation business to AMD (171 points | 126 comments)
23. Apple Watch sleep apnea detection gets FDA approval (347 points | 250 comments)
24. Provable Security of Linux-DRBG in the Seedless Robustness Model [pdf] (27 points | 2 comments)
25. The Pragmatic Programmer for Machine Learning (102 points | 10 comments)
26. S6 – skarnet's small supervision suite (82 points | 27 comments)
27. Fair: A Go library for serving resources fairly (180 points | 36 comments)
28. Finetune, Eval, Deploy 60 LLMs in a single Colab notebook (23 points | 1 comment)
29. The internet is worse than it used to be. How did we get here? (17 points | 11 comments)
30. How to succeed in MrBeast production (Leaked PDF) (1932 points | 1237 comments)
